channel.title: containerd on 特倫蘇的日與夜
channel.description: Recent content in containerd on 特倫蘇的日與夜

item.title: 🔐 Authentik - An alternative of self-hosted Single-Sign-On Module That you might Need
item.description: If you are working on a homelab, you might need a module to use one account to walk around. You might need Authentik. This is not a post for the introduction, but a post for let you need this Authentik, a self-hosted SSO application.

item.title: K3s/Kubernetes - From K3s to Kubernetes: Build a High availability Kubernetes Cluster with Kubeadm
